name: Rounded
description:
Classic puzzle games are bored, right? How about changing your perception of the puzzle game. A very challenging and fun adventure awaits you. No need to say too much, everyone deserves it!

MANY DIFFERENT LOCATIONS

The joy of solving mazes in dozens of unique places. You will feel like you are there!

ATTRACTIVE GRAPHICS

How would you like to have an experience with great graphics?

FOR THOSE WHO LOVE DIFFICULT

Character control, labyrinth design and obstacles. It adds you a difficult game with everything.

TWO DIFFERENT MODES

How would you like to try the hard levels that are almost impossible to pass, except for the classic episodes?

With everything, a completely different game awaits you.
